Package com.adobe.idp.taskmanager.dsc.client.emailsettings

The com.adobe.idp.taskmanager.dsc.client.emailsettings package represents the email settings for Adobe Experience Manager forms workflow.

Package com.adobe.idp.taskmanager.dsc.client.emailsettings Description

The com.adobe.idp.taskmanager.dsc.client.emailsettings package represents the email settings for Adobe Experience Manager forms workflow. It lets applications set the same parameters that administrators set by using the Adobe Experience Manager forms workflow tools in Adobe Experience Manager forms Administration Console.

This package lets you programatically access and change the following settings:

  • Email settings for sending and receiving email message to users and administrators.
  • Templates that Adobe Experience Manager forms workflow uses to generate the email notifications that are sent to users and groups.
  • Templates that Adobe Experience Manager forms workflow uses to generate the email notifications that are sent to administrators.

To programatically change email notification for a specific task, use the EmailNotifications object.
